sense.def:
A date
je določen dan, na primer 7. junij 1990, ali leto, na primer 1066.

seg.quote: No date was announced for the talks.
Their effects to date have been limited.

sense.def:
To date something
pomeni nečemu določiti datum, ko se je začelo ali bilo izdelano.

seg.quote: How can we date these fossils?

sense.def:
To date a letter or a cheque
pomeni, da na pismo ali ček napišemo datum tistega dne.

At a particular date
pomeni ob določenem času ali na določeni stopnji.

seg.quote: The matter may be worth pursuing at a later date.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
dates
, je prišlo iz mode.

A date
je tudi dogovor, da se bomo z nekom srečali ali šli z njim ven, zlasti z osebo nasprotnega spola.

seg.quote: Sorry I can't come—I have a date with Jill.

sense.def:
One's date
je oseba nasprotnega spola, s katero smo zmenjeni;

cit.quote: fant ali dekle, s katerim gremo na zmenek

seg.quote: Her date says that he doesn't know either.

sense.def:
To be dating someone of the opposite sex
pomeni, da imamo z osebo nasprotnega spola redne zmenke;

A date
je tudi majhen, lepljiv, temno rjav sadež; zraste na palmi.

Kadar nekaj
dates back to a particular time
ali kadar nekaj
dates from a particular time
, se je začelo ali bilo izdelano ob določenem času.

seg.quote: The present city hall dates back to the 1880s.
...a manuscript dating from the eleventh century.
